wikipedia_page.main:
Sir Alexander Morley  (6 January 1908 – 19 September 1971) was a British diplomat.
He served as  High Commissioner to Ceylon and High Commissioner to Jamaica, then was ambassador of the United Kingdom to Hungary, retiring in 1967.
